I've been looking for a way to incoporate xkcd in my [#thankyou](http://livefreeordichotomize.com/tags/thankyou/) series & recently came across this gem:

[xkcd](http://xkcd.com) has been there during some of my [*finest*](http://livefreeordichotomize.com/2016/12/15/hill-for-the-data-scientist-an-xkcd-story/) statistical moments, so they certainly deserve a proper thank you. I use the [xkcd](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/xkcd/xkcd.pdf) `R` package to explore the relationship between the time I've spent on statistics and the time I've spent on xkcd ([correlation $\neq$ causation](https://xkcd.com/552/)...but $\rho$ = 0.84). 



```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
library('ggplot2')
library('xkcd')
load("../../data/xkcd_data.rda")
```


```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
set.seed(916)
xkcdlabel <-  function(text,x,y, above= FALSE) {
  if (above == TRUE){
    add = 4
    beg = 3
  } else {
    add = -4
    beg = -3
  }
  ann <- annotate("text", x=x, y = y , label=text,family ="xkcd")
  list(ann,
       xkcdline(aes(xbegin=xbegin, ybegin= ybegin, xend=xend,yend=yend),
                data.frame(xbegin=x,ybegin= y+beg , xend=x,yend=y+add), xjitteramount = 0.5))
}

p <- ggplot(data) + 
  geom_smooth(mapping=aes(x=time, y =spent, group = stat, linetype = stat), 
              se = FALSE,
              method="loess",
              span = 0.25) +
  xkcdaxis(c(2008,2018),c(0,44)) +
  xkcdlabel("BU\n SIBS",x=2011.5,y = 12) +
  xkcdlabel("1st year comps\n closed book",x=2015.3,y = 1.5, above = TRUE) +
  xkcdlabel("2nd year comps\n open book",x=2016.7,y = 42) +
  xkcdlabel("Start \ncollege",x = 2008.6,y = 8) +
  scale_linetype_discrete(name = "Time spent on") +
  theme(axis.title.y=element_blank(),
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank(),
        legend.position = c(.25,.75)) +
  ggtitle("Thank you, xkcd!")
p



```


You can make one too - run the code below with my data or input your own! Happy plotting üëØ


```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
library('ggplot2')
library('xkcd')

load(url("https://github.com/LFOD/real-blog/raw/master/data/xkcd_data.rda"))
```


```{r, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, eval = FALSE}
set.seed(916)

  if (above == TRUE){
    add = 4
    beg = 3
  } else {
    add = -4

  }
 ann <- annotate("text", x=x, y = y , label=text,family ="xkcd")
  list(ann,

                data.frame(xbegin=x,ybegin= y+beg , xend=x,yend=y+add), xjitteramount = 0.5))
}

p <- ggplot(data) +

              method="loess",

  scale_linetype_discrete(name = "Time spent on") +
```
